content:
Congratulations on your new swim cap and goggles! I'd be happy to help you find a gym with swim classes in your area. However, I need a bit more information from you. Could you please provide me with your location or zip code? That way, I can give you a more accurate list of gyms in your area that offer swim classes.

Additionally, are you looking for a specific type of swim class, such as water aerobics, lap swimming, or swim lessons? Are there any other amenities or features you're looking for in a gym, such as a pool size, hours of operation, or childcare services?

Once I have this information, I can provide you with a list of gyms in your area that fit your needs and preferences.
